sections.title: Overview

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The section does not include diagrams, only textual content about the ANLN gene and anillin protein.
There is no use of diagrams in the section, so suggesting expansions to standardized formatting is not relevant.

sections.meta_notes: The Overview section provides a clear explanation of the ANLN gene and the protein anillin, including its roles and implications in disease without requiring diagrams, hence formatting guidelines for images do not apply.
